name: Selfish Heart
description:
Artistic video clip of the song "Selfish Heart" by the group "Borraine's Water" formed by Alex Romero and Marc MB.

Animations made using artificial intelligence by Toñin Lizana @unaraneta

"Selfish Heart" talks about the importance that is currently given to one's own image, how this image has become a priority for people, although on many occasions, no matter how hard we try, each one is as it is and nothing can change it. 

The piece was created in March 2021 and during that year, among others, it went through the following festivals:
The Museum of Wild and Newfangled Art - New York - United States
Unreal Bonfires - Ljubljana - Slovenia
Supernova "Everything Abstract Sonic" - Denver - United States
Creative Screens - Centro Etopia - Zaragoza - Spain
Façade Video Festival - Plovdiv - Bulgaria
